results.definition: stay in one place and anticipate or expect something
examples: I had to wait on line for an hour to get the tickets
the scientists held off announcing their results until they repeated the experiment

results.definition: look forward to the probable occurrence of
examples: We were expecting a visit from our relatives
She is looking to a promotion
he is waiting to be drafted

results.definition: serve as a waiter or waitress in a restaurant
examples: I'm waiting on tables at Maxim's
